id.description: The user's id. ('me' can be used if you are using a user level API key)

address.description:
[single-line only]

Line 1 of the new E911 address.

[single-line only]

Line 2 of the new E911 address.

[single-line only]

City of the new E911 address.

country.description: Country of the new E911 address.

use_validated_option.description: Whether to use the validated address option from our service.

zip.description:

Zip of the new E911 address.
